info.title: My API Documentation
info.description: Official API docs for my Laravel app.

post.description: Registers a new user of type 'admin' or 'customer'. Returns a user object and an authentication token.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: User type to register. Either 'admin' or 'customer'.

items.example: The email has already been taken.

post.description: Logs in a user of the given type and returns a token.
Revokes the current access token for the authenticated user. Requires Bearer token.

get.summary: Get all items in the authenticated user's cart
get.description: Returns a list of cart items with product details and total price. Requires authentication.

post.description: Adds a product to the authenticated user's cart, or updates quantity if it already exists. Requires authentication.

200.description: Cart item updated successfully (if already exists)

put.summary: Update quantity of a cart item
put.description: Updates the quantity of a specific item in the authenticated user's cart. Requires authentication.

delete.description: Deletes a specific item from the authenticated user's cart. Requires authentication.

get.description: Returns a list of categories that don't have a parent, along with their children.

post.description: Creates a new category with an optional parent. Requires authentication and 'create categories' permission.

get.description: Returns a specific category by its ID, including its children if any.

delete.description: Deletes a category by ID and reassigns its children to its parent (or null). Requires authentication and 'delete categories' permission.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to delete

patch.description: Updates a category by ID. Requires authentication and 'edit categories' permission.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to update

get.description: Returns all products that belong to a specific category. Requires authentication.

post.description: Searches for categories using a partial name match. Requires authentication.

name.description: Name or part of the name to search for

post.description: Creates an order from the user's cart. Requires authentication.

400.description: Cart is empty or Product out of stock

message.example: Failed to place order: DB error

get.summary: Get order history for the authenticated user
get.description: Retrieves all orders placed by the logged-in user. Requires authentication.
Returns the details of a specific order for the authenticated user.
Returns all orders in the system. Requires authentication and 'view orders' permission.

403.description: Forbidden - You don't have the required permissions

post.summary: Process payment for a specific order
post.description: Initiate the payment process for a specific order using Paymob.

400.description: Bad request or order not payable

401.description: Unauthorized to pay for this order

message.example: Failed  to place order: Something went wrong

get.description: Returns a list of all products with their images.

post.description: Creates a new product with multiple images. Requires authentication and 'create products' permission.

get.summary: Get a specific product by ID
get.description: Returns details of a specific product including its images.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to retrieve

put.description: Updates an existing product and its images. Requires authentication and 'edit products' permission.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to update

message.example: The price must be a number.

delete.description: Deletes a product and all its associated images. Requires authentication and 'delete products' permission.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to delete

post.description: Returns products that match the search query. Requires authentication.

get.summary: Get all roles with their permissions
get.description: Returns all roles along with their assigned permissions. Requires authentication and 'view roles' permission.

403.description: Forbidden - You don't have the required permissions

get.summary: Get permissions of a specific role
get.description: Returns all permissions assigned to a specific role by role ID. Requires authentication and 'view roles' permission.

post.description: Assigns a specific role to a user. Requires authentication and 'create roles' permission.
Creates a new role. Requires authentication and 'create roles' permission.
Removes a specific role from a user. Requires authentication and 'delete roles' permission.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all permissions in the system. Requires authentication and 'view permissions' permission.

post.description: Assigns a specific permission to a given role. Requires authentication and 'assign permissions' permission.
Removes a specific permission from a given role. Requires authentication and 'assign permissions' permission.
Assigns a specific permission to a given user. Requires authentication and 'assign permissions' permission.
Removes a specific permission from a user. Requires authentication and 'assign permissions' permission.

get.description: Returns a list of all users. Requires authentication and 'view users' permission.
Returns a specific user by their ID. Requires authentication and 'view users' permission.

delete.description: Deletes a specific user by ID. Requires authentication and 'delete users' permission.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete

patch.description: Updates the specified user's name, email, or password. Requires authentication and 'edit users' permission.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

post.description: Searches users by name or email. Requires authentication and 'view users' permission.

query.description: Keyword to search by name or email

sanctum.description: Enter your Bearer token to access this endpoint
sanctum.name: Authorization
